name: VAPORWHALE Hot Date (GGJ2017)
description:
Leonard is a Killer Whale looking for love. He's often misunderstood by the other sea life and is haunted by his violent past. Desperate to find a life long companion, Leonard makes a Fin-der account and meets Tiffany, a local dolphin.

Help Leonard keep up with the conversation by collecting Tiffany's talking bubbles on their first date.

=====================

Controls:

Use [Space Bar] to move.

Collect all the Talking bubbles.

If Leonard passes enough conversation checks, he might find Eternal Love!

=====================

For the 2017 48-hour Global Game Jam.

Theme: WAVES

For general questions reach out to:

Mikerenyi@gmail.com

http://www.mikeyren.com
